typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		companyName as string,
		projectName as string,
		taskDescription as string,
		dumperDriverName as string,
		dumperId as string,
		loaderName as string,
		projectNumber as string,
		projectCompanyId as string,
		projectCompanyName as string,
		dumperName as string,
		massType as string,
		quantity as double,
		quantityM3 as double,
		m3PerHour as double,
		loadDateTime as string,
		dumpDateTime as string,
		tripId as string,
		averageSpeed as double,
		distance as double,
		loadLocationName as string,
		dumpLocationName as string,
		comment as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'NONE',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		companyName as string,
		projectName as string,
		taskDescription as string,
		dumperDriverName as string,
		loaderName as string,
		projectNumber as string,
		projectCompanyId as string,
		projectCompanyName as string,
		dumperName as string,
		massType as string,
		quantity as double,
		quantityM3 as double,
		m3PerHour as double,
		dumpCode as string,
		loadDateTime as string,
		dumpDateTime as string,
		tripId as string,
		loaderDriverName as string,
		averageSpeed as double,
		distance as double,
		loadLocationName as string,
		dumpLocationName as string,
		comment as string,
		externalProjectId as string,
		registrationNumber as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['TRUNCATE TABLE MassTransport'],
	postSQLs:['TRUNCATE TABLE MassTransportNewData'],
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkNewData
